Pricing

Simple Visit $65

Simple Visits include one condition/refill

Complex Visit $85

Complex Visits include 2 or more conditions/refills

Pack of 4 Simple Visits $245

4 Simple Visits include one condition/refill per visit. Visits do not expire.

Start Your Visit

*$65/visit applies to simple visit

**All fees are subject to change. All charges are NON-REFUNDABLE once a virtual connection has been made, attempted and/or services are rendered; regardless of outcome. See terms and conditions.
